item.title: Cyclist near miss with 80 year old woman & dog, 5th September
item.description:
An arrogant cyclist travelling between 30 - 35mph on Footpath/cycleway forces elderly woman and her dog to move swiftly off of path. Cyclist failed to brake/slow down. Time 14:46 Fri 05.09.2025 Cyclist travelling Bickley - Petts Wood. Location close to entrance to Jubilee Park where footpath splits from cycleway. Spoke to a group of walkers on guided tour of park who were subject to same behaviour further up towards play area. Signs were erected a few years ago but were soon knocked down by (cyclists?). Whilst a few cyclist are well behaved and respect signs "Give way to pedestrians" unfortunately there are a large number that have little or no respect for others. What can council do to slow down cyclists, enforce basic safety rules. CCTV maybe. Is this a police matter?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tent Peg Lane, Petts Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bouncy platform with missing springs, 5th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravenbourne Estate, Southend, London

item.title: Tree branch hanging down into the road which hits small van roofs and could hit an Amazon type delivery van and be broken off potentially causing damage to the tree and the van, 5th September
item.description:
The tree has never been pruned since I moved here in 2008. The branches are now hanging too low and could hit a person or a vehicle. They are way too low down for the required height from the road and need pruning urgently.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pembroke Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unlicenced HMO with more than 6 people, 5th September
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned for 8 weeks, 5th September

item.title: Dried up dog fouling in front of 77 Fernhead Road, 5th September
item.description:
Dried up dog on the pavement which is in front of 77 Fernhead Road. The fouling also goes around the corner and slightly into Shirland Road. The who area needs a through wash down. Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet
